name: (Dis)SOLVE
description:
In (Dis)SOLVE you play as two cubes that split and JOIN TOGETHER . Solve challenging puzzles and traverse difficult platforming segments to clear 8 stages. 

Made in 48hrs for the GMTK game jam and made using Construct 3.

I really hope you enjoy this game I made, I worked really hard on it :)
